Data: {"recipient_id": "f0f04c56-54db-4acb-91ae-d9d450fb6b89", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hello. I'm a new advertiser and would like to increase the charge setting. Currently it's $20. My daily spend is about $500, so I would like it increased to $500

Hi there! To increase your daily budget from $20 to $500, it's important to do it gradually to maintain stable performance. We recommend increasing your budget by no more than 50% every 2-3 days. So, you could increase it to $30 first, then monitor the performance for a few days before making further increases. This approach helps the system optimize effectively without causing fluctuations in performance. Let me know if you need any more help!
i don't want to increase budget. I want to increase the amount my credit card is billed for ad spend. I'm spending $500/day and getting charged each $20 of spend.

Got it! To increase the charge setting on your account, please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with your request. They will be able to assist you in adjusting the billing threshold to better match your daily spend of $500. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
